name: Nyanko Wants Food
description:
Little cat hungry! Go to food bowl and eat food!

This game made for Mini Jam 80:Cats

Limitation: All textures and sprites must be 8x8 resolution

I maded this game by myself. This is my second Unity project, im newbie on this engine, so my game might have some problems, please comment for it :) 

Controls writing on main menu. Thanks for playin!
